title: Riot, this  yasou nerf won't be enough to get him through bans
body:
I'm sorry but it won't, too many people have different problems with the champ and varying opinions on why yasou is so annoying to play against you just hit on one of them but there are a few more which are often spoken about 

His windwall needs to be looked at, it should only block from the side he was facing when cast. It is my personal gripe when facing a yasou.

His ult should only be proced by knock ups, no more vayne e into a yasou r.

I'm not to sure if they fixed his r positioning afer he ults but it was once the case he would land outside of tower range after an r tower dive, perhaps someone else can clarify.

Strong lane bully and a strong late game, it is what it is and he is not the only one guilty of this still can be seen as an issue

His double passive

Thoughts?

replies.body: Actually these nerfs are very good. Its what I suggested a while ago. It lowers yasuos ability to sit on his tornado and zone his opponent from cs for 10 seconds in the early game.

but thats not the point i am making, its that there is varying opinions on why he is unfun to play against. Some people still talk about his mobility, is it a problem? No its not but some people believe it to be true.
I'd argue that with Jhin holding his 4th shot, he can't farm without using abilities. Annie and Yasou can still auto away.

There had to be a down side to him zoning people off farm when he was strong

A similar change to Annie wouldn't work because she would just hold a 3 stacks instead of 4.

>I'm not to sure if they fixed his r positioning afer he ults but it was once the case he would land outside of tower range after an r tower dive, perhaps someone else can clarify.

^Not a bug.  This is the intended interaction since he locks himself into the R channel.

> [{quoted}](name=LostFr0st,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=egFLoxun,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-28T19:01:10.961+0000)

> ^Not a bug.  This is the intended interaction since he locks himself into the R channel.

All other champions with channeled abilities lock themselves into the channel, too.  They know not to do it under turret if they can't get out.  I've always hated this argument.  Should Fiddlesticks' drain teleport him outside of turret range, too?  Katarina R?  Cait ult?

None of those abilities are connected with a blink, nor are they activatable outside of vision range.  They all know where they are and will end up (nowhere).

The closest thing to the Yasuo case is probably Ekko ult but again there's something, he heals and becomes untargetable with an invulnerability pocket.

Yasuo is a strong lane bully lvls 1 and 2 against champs that need all 3 abilities to trade properly. Beyond that, he's a very meh laner until he gets his PD in which case he has a window to start winning again until the enemy laner finishes their first big item.

His ability to zone most champions off the minion wave for 10 seconds (now 8) is huge combined with his ability to all in at will during the lane phase and shrug off harass with his shield and avoid all ins with windwall.  Basically he has above average counters to all ways that other players could beat him during lane.  His worst case scenario in lane is that he misses a cs or two a wave and gets no kills pre 6.

Now 6. And above average counters to all ways is a huge exaggeration. Juggs and bruisers shit on him, and tanks also shit on him past the first few levels. Even a decent number of mages do well against him.
